page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: Claire,Catherine and myself went for a walk round Ashover.We looked at some of the house to try to find out about the peoples life styes.Also by looking at the way people dressed and the cars they drove,we think that their are some quite rich people and that the children are well cared for.The people that lived in the Hollies (thats next to the school) must have been quite well off because they have got a private drive. Amberstone House looks very nice the people who own it must live in luxury because they got a swimming pool. Redworth,thats a house on the Rattle,looks lovely and is worth a lot of money.The life of most people in our area is good because we think that they earn more than the average person.
